: : Darkangel : :

Angel nodds, then takes the nearest computer station. He tries to istablish a connection with the Predacon base. It fails. Another attempt wields the same result. Darkangel runs a scan, discovering the jamming field. He looks back to Tyrael.

Darkangel: Sir, we have a very serious problem. I've detected a global jamming field. All communications on the planet are being blocked!


Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote:
Tyrael: I know that, but hopefully, the truce we hold with the Preds 
will ease that up... a bit. Remember, do NOT mention Unicron.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Darkangel : :
> 
> Darkangel: So I'm to ask them to supply and combine their ships 
weapons to this battery in a combined effort? Both sides will be 
reluctant, but I shall try.
> 
> Angel waits to see if his commander has any more to say before he 
follows his standing orders.
> 
> 
> Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Tyrael: My plan is to build a giant artillery battery in order to 
> greet our moon-sized friend... Contact the Predacons, then the

make

<DIV><STRONG>: : Darkangel : :</STRONG></DIV>
<P>Angel nodds, then takes the nearest computer station. He tries to istablish a connection with the Predacon base. It fails. Another attempt wields the same result. Darkangel runs a scan, discovering the jamming field. He looks back to Tyrael.</P>
<P><STRONG>Darkangel: </STRONG>Sir, we have a very serious problem. I've detected a global jamming field. All communications on the planet are being blocked!</P>
